subject: Suits and Litigation
Child Abuse and Neglect
Sex Crimes
College Athletics
Colleges and Universities
Football (College)
lead_paragraph: Lawyers for victims in the Jerry Sandusky sexual abuse case say that Penn State has not followed up with concrete action after saying it wanted to settle “privately, expeditiously and fairly.”
snippet: Lawyers for victims in the Jerry Sandusky sexual abuse case say that Penn State has not followed up with concrete action after saying it wanted to settle “privately, expeditiously and fairly.”
